statements: UPDATE wallet_activity SET amount = 100.50, transaction_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE transaction_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j'
UPDATE wallet_activity SET suspicious = true, description = 'Refund for order #123' WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-g7h8-i9j0'
UPDATE wallet_activity SET description = 'Deposit from Savings' WHERE transaction_id = '23f5bb2c-e4c2-46ab-b878-4373e1c0667a';
UPDATE wallet_activity SET amount = 500.25, transaction_date = '2022-03-15 10:30:00', suspicious = true WHERE user_id = 'c16bd448-d05e-4bf4-962d-7a9e76886827';
UPDATE wallet_transactions SET amount = 100.50, transaction_type = 'DEPOSIT' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET flagged = true, reason = 'Unusual activity detected' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE wallet_transactions SET amount = 500.75, transaction_type = 'deposit' WHERE id = 100;
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET reason = 'Fraudulent Activity', flagged = true, flagged_date = '2022-01-12 14:30:00' WHERE id = 50;
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET amount = 1000.55 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE wallet SET balance = 500.25 WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET amount = 500.55 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE wallet SET balance = balance - 100.00 WHERE id = 3
UPDATE user_accounts SET balance = balance + 500 WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE transaction_logs SET amount = amount + 100, transaction_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = 456 AND transaction_id = 789;
UPDATE user_accounts SET balance = balance + 1000.00 WHERE username = 'alice';
UPDATE transaction_logs SET amount = amount - 500.00, transaction_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.25, transaction_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE source_account = 'X12345' AND destination_account = 'Y54321';
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 100.75, last_transaction_date = NOW() WHERE account_owner = 'Alice';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.25, transaction_date = '2022-01-10 15:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance + 1000.50, last_transaction_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE account_id = 2001;
